channel.title: Smf
channel.description:
Teh faukles?
Okay so I was testing how report to a moderator works on my own forums. So i created an account that spammed... another account to report it and a global mod. So when spammer spammed then I reported it with the reporter and then logged onto the Gmod... but i dont know how to check the reported messages.
Help?

item.title: Smf
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:1, topic:138257”]Teh faukles?

Okay so I was testing how report to a moderator works on my own forums. So i created an account that spammed… another account to report it and a global mod. So when spammer spammed then I reported it with the reporter and then logged onto the Gmod… but i dont know how to check the reported messages.

Help?[/quote]
Unless you install a certain mod, it will email the admins and mods when somebody reports somebody.

EDIT: Damn you jdb, you beat me to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Smf
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Hmm, I’m not sure I’ve always just used this mod: http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=242 which creates a topic.

Read full topic
